{"id":1320294419,"question_id":3501,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"6 months, 4 weeks","timestamp":1720926718,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"438 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1320294419/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Delete Nodes From Linked List Present in Array","memory":"258.3 MB","code":"/**\nYou are given an array of integers nums and the head of a linked list. Return the head of the modified linked list after removing \nall nodes from the linked list that have a value that exists in nums.\n * Definition for singly-linked list.\n * struct ListNode {\n *     int val;\n *     ListNode *next;\n *     ListNode() : val(0), next(nullptr) {}\n *     ListNode(int x) : val(x), next(nullptr) {}\n *     ListNode(int x, ListNode *next) : val(x), next(next) {}\n * };\n */\nclass Solution {\npublic:\n    ListNode* modifiedList(vector<int>& nums, ListNode* head) {\n        unordered_set<int> set;\n        for(int i=0; i<nums.size(); i++) {\n            set.insert(nums[i]);\n        };\n\n        ListNode* fake_head = new ListNode(0, head);\n        ListNode* cur = head;\n        ListNode* prev = fake_head;\n        while(cur != nullptr) {\n            if(set.find(cur->val)!= set.end()) { //found\n                cur = cur->next;\n                prev->next = cur;\n            } else {\n                prev = cur;\n                cur = cur->next;\n            };\n        }\n\n        return fake_head->next;\n        \n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"delete-nodes-from-linked-list-present-in-array","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
